meaningMnemonic:
This radical is the same as the kanji. It means <radical>angle</radical>.

Just in case you don't remember this, here's the kanji meaning mnemonic: Your <radical>task</radical> in <radical>prison</radical> is to bend things into all kinds of different <kanji>angle</kanji>s. No one will tell you why you're doing this, but you get a couple cents an hour to do it, so you aren't going to complain.
